Class AlertTheme

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.Theme
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.proxy.ProxyTheme<AlertInfo>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.alert.AlertTheme
public class AlertTheme extends ProxyTheme<AlertInfo>
Theme for alert objects on the map.
Author:
Gordon Parikh, Douglas Lau

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g, MapObject mo)
      Draw the specified map object. Overridden to do nothing so only selected alerts are drawn.
      Overrides:
      draw in class Theme

    • hit

      public boolean hit(Point2D p, MapObject mo)
      Hit-test an alert
      Overrides:
      hit in class Theme

    • drawSelected

      public void drawSelected(Graphics2D g, MapObject mo)
      Draw the alert on the map. The GeoLoc is the centroid of the alert and is not drawn (really just kind of a hack to get this method to fire). The alert area is drawn, along with DMS selected for the alert.
      Overrides:
      drawSelected in class Theme

    • zoomToAlertArea

      public void zoomToAlertArea(AlertInfo ai)
      Zoom to the selected alert area, showing the entire area on the map.
